entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
